devdoc.author: Venus
devdoc.details: This contract provides functions to manage liquidations in the venus protocol. It calculates close factors, dynamic liquidation incentives, and the number of tokens to seize during liquidation. It also checks if a liquidation is toxic based on average liquidation threshold and health factor.

params.market: The address of the market that is not listed.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.borrowBalance: The borrow balance of the borrower
params.dynamicLiquidationIncentive: The dynamic liquidation incentive, scaled by 1e18
params.totalCollateral: The total collateral available for liquidation
params.wtAvg: The weighted average of the collateral

returns.closeFactor: The calculated close factor, scaled by 1e18

params.healthFactor: The health factor of the borrower
params.liquidationThresholdAvg: The average liquidation threshold of the collateral
params.maxLiquidationIncentiveMantissa: The maximum liquidation incentive allowed, scaled by 1e18

returns.incentive: The calculated dynamic liquidation incentive, scaled by 1e18

constructor.details: Ensures that the provided addresses are non-zero and that the close factors and health factor are within valid ranges.      Reverts with `InvalidBaseCloseFactor` if `_baseCloseFactorMantissa` is invalid.      Reverts with `InvalidDefaultCloseFactor` if `_defaultCloseFactorMantissa` is invalid.      Reverts with `InvalidTargetHealthFactor` if `_targetHealthFactor` is invalid.

params.baseCloseFactorMantissa_: The base close factor, scaled by 1e18.
params.defaultCloseFactorMantissa_: The default close factor, scaled by 1e18.
params.targetHealthFactor_: The target health factor, scaled by 1e18.

params.accessControlManager_: The address of the access control manager contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

params.enabled: Boolean indicating whether the dynamic close factor should be enabled or disabled.
params.market: The address of the market to update.

params.enabled: Boolean indicating whether the dynamic liquidation incentive should be enabled or disabled.
params.market: The address of the market to update.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

dynamicCloseFactorEnabled.details: Maps a market address to a boolean flag for dynamic close factor activation.

dynamicLiquidationIncentiveEnabled.details: Maps a market address to a boolean flag for dynamic liquidation incentive activation.

devdoc.title: LiquidationManager

CollateralExceedsBorrowCapacity().notice: Error thrown when collateral exceeds borrow capacity

InvalidBaseCloseFactor().notice: Error thrown when the provided base close factor is invalid.

InvalidDefaultCloseFactor().notice: Error thrown when the provided default close factor is invalid.

InvalidTargetHealthFactor().notice: Error thrown when the provided target health factor is invalid.

MarketNotListed(address).notice: Error thrown when the specified market is not listed.

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

DynamicCloseFactorEnabledSet(address,boo.notice: Emitted when the dynamic close factor is enabled or disabled for a market.

DynamicLiquidationIncentiveEnabledSet(ad.notice: Emitted when the dynamic liquidation incentive is enabled or disabled for a market.

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

baseCloseFactorMantissa().notice: Base close factor, scaled by 1e18 (e.g., 0.05e18 for 5%)

calculateDynamicCloseFactor(address,uint.notice: Calculate the close factor for a liquidation

calculateDynamicLiquidationIncentive(add.notice: Calculate the dynamic liquidation incentive based on health factor and average liquidation threshold

defaultCloseFactorMantissa().notice: Default close factor, scaled by 1e18 (e.g., 5e17 for 50%)

dynamicCloseFactorEnabled(address).notice: Indicates whether the dynamic close factor is enabled for a given market.

dynamicLiquidationIncentiveEnabled(addre.notice: Indicates whether the dynamic liquidation incentive is enabled for a given market.

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the contract with the access control manager.

setDynamicCloseFactorEnabled(address,boo.notice: Enables or disables the dynamic close factor for a specific market.

setDynamicLiquidationIncentiveEnabled(ad.notice: Enables or disables the dynamic liquidation incentive for a specific market.

targetHealthFactor().notice: Target health factor, scaled by 1e18 (e.g., 1.5e18 for 1.5)

userdoc.notice: This contract is designed to be used in conjunction with the venus protocol's liquidation process.
